results.text: And the prayer offered in faith will make the sick person well; the Lord will raise them up. If they have sinned, they will be forgiven.
results.reason: Shows the power of prayer and faith in healing.
results.reflection: Healing is not only physical but also spiritual, bringing restoration and forgiveness.

results.text: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.
results.reason: A plea for healing directly to the Lord.
results.reflection: Our ultimate healing and salvation come from God alone, and we can find true praise in His restoration.

results.text: But he was pierced for our transgressions, he was crushed for our iniquities; the punishment that brought us peace was on him, and by his wounds we are healed.
results.reason: Points to the ultimate healing through Jesus' sacrifice.
results.reflection: The greatest healing we can receive is through the wounds of Christ, bringing us peace and restoration.

results.text: Jesus went throughout Galilee, teaching in their synagogues, proclaiming the good news of the kingdom, and healing every disease and sickness among the people.
results.reason: Demonstrates Jesus' power and compassion in healing.
results.reflection: Just as Jesus healed the sick during His ministry, He is still able and willing to bring healing to us today.
